entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
